page.title: 10LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content:
{BALLYSALLY COMMUNITY CENTRE { ...........................
A modern purpose_built building houses a large hall equipped for most sports, from indoor bowls to karate,netball and tabletennis.There is a general purpose room,a quiet room,a coffee room and kitchen.Youth clubs are organised for the children, and regular discos are held.
{ THE UNIVERSITY ................ The University provides good facilities for indoor and out door activities.Four hard porous pitches,four flood_lit tennis courts and fields for soccer,rugby,gaelic football and hockey.Indoors are six squash courts,sauna,fitness room and a large sports hall.
